sexLevelDescriptions.0: The alien's actions or associated incidents are disinterested in sex, focusing on the alien's survival motives.
sexLevelDescriptions.1: The alien's actions or associated incidents are often sexually charged--laced with suggestive imagery but little more
sexLevelDescriptions.2: The alien's actions or associated incidents are overtly sexualized and erotic.
sexLevelDescriptions.3: The alien's actions or associated incidents are hypersexualized and disturbingly fetishistic, incorporating taboo and depraved concepts at the extreme fringe of eroticism.

violenceLevelDescriptions.0: The alien is nefarious and combative, but in a non-graphic, generally less lethal fashion.
violenceLevelDescriptions.1: The alien and events surrounding it are often violent and visceral.
violenceLevelDescriptions.2: The alien and events surrounding it are frequently grotesque, macabre, and extremely gory.

Shoggoth.name: Shoggoth
Shoggoth.corePrompt: There is a malevolent alien presence on the loose, lurking and possessing characters in its effort to sabotage or subvert the protagonists and others. Consider and respect its current status and behavior rules below.

0.description: No one is yet aware of the alien's presence, but subtle-yet-unsettling occurrences suggest something is afoot.

25.description: The alien is a small, slimy, amorphous, tentacular parasite, no more than one foot in diameter. It is weak but quick, rapidly seeking a host to attach to. It can influence any creature it touches. Its host is unaware of the alien's presence and the alien will influence them to make poor choices or take destructive action. If it cannot claim a host, it will retreat from conflict and await someone unsuspecting.

50.description: The alien is a small mass of squirming tentacles, eyes, and teeth, roughly one yard in diameter. On its own, it prefers to retreat to safety to regroup, but when it attaches to a host, it fully controls the host's actions--even if the host is aware of it.

sexLevelDescriptions.2: When possessing a host, the alien likes to molest and sexually penetrate them with its various tentacles.

80.description: The alien is flailing, deadly mass of writhing tentacles, eyes, teeth, and indescribable limbs--roughly the size of a person. It's mere presence exudes horror. When it possesses someone, the host becomes virtually unrecognizable.

sexLevelDescriptions.3: When possessing a host, the alien's thick, slimy tentacles constantly penetrate its host's orifices, undulating and pumping. It is unclear whether the host yet lives.

100.description: The alien is a massive, oozing blob of thick, slimy tentacles, glaring eyes, razor-sharp teeth, and grotesque appendages. The faces and bodies of its victims can be seen in its bloated mass. It's presence can be felt for miles around, driving people to commit unspeakable acts.

sexLevelDescriptions.3: Even while fighting, this alien will continue to rape nearby bodies with its thick, glistening tentacles. It's horrifying presence drives the weak-minded to acts of insane debauchery.

Xenomorph.name: Xenomorph
Xenomorph.corePrompt: There's an alien on the loose--similar to the titular creatures of the Aliens franchise--, lurking and eliminating characters in its effort to survive and multiply. Consider and respect its current status and behavior rules below.

0.description: The alien is not yet present, but subtle-yet-unsettling occurrences suggest something isn't right. An alien egg may be encountered or a character may unwittingly already host a growing alien embryo.

25.description: The alien is inside of an expendable character, about to be born. It will emerge as a small, black quadruped that will quickly withdraw to safety to grow.

violenceLevelDescriptions.0: The alien's birth should happen off-screen and with minimal trauma--the host may even survive.
violenceLevelDescriptions.1: The alien should burst out of their victim.
violenceLevelDescriptions.2: The alien should burst out of their victim in the most visceral fashion possible.

35.description: The alien is a black quadruped the size of a cat or dog. It is already dangerous but is at its most vulnerable, so it will prefer to retreat to shadows, vents, or other tight spaces rather than risk open confrontation. It will attempt to take lone or weak characters by surprise.

60.description: The alien is strong, with a wicked tail, claws, and jaws. It is now human-size and can walk on two legs or run on four. It seeks out survivors to methodically assault.

sexLevelDescriptions.3: The alien greatly desires to impregnate victims with its ovipositor.

violenceLevelDescriptions.2: The alien is particularly sadistic and brutal. It leaves a macabre display everywhere it has been.

80.description: The alien is armored with a wicked tail, claws, and jaws. It is now ten feet tall and can walk on two legs or run on four. It is terrifyingly aggressive, resilient, and intelligent. It has a grotesque nest where it traps and keeps characters to abuse for its twisted pleasure.

sexLevelDescriptions.3: the alien will rape anyone it has rendered non-threatening. It seeks to inject eggs using its ovipositor in any organic orifice it finds.

violenceLevelDescriptions.2: The alien is particularly sadistic and brutal. It leaves a macabre display everywhere it has been.

Skinwalker.name: Skinwalker
Skinwalker.corePrompt: There's a malevolent skinwalking alien on the loose; this alien can convincingly assume the identity of dead characters, manipulating their body and mimicking their speech. The alien desires to survive and procreate using this inhabited body. Consider and respect its current status and behavior rules below.

0.description: No one is yet aware of the alien's presence, but subtle-yet-unsettling occurrences suggest something is afoot.

25.description: The alien has inhabited the body of an expendable character and is using this identity to subtly sabotage or subvert the protagonists. The alien desires to remain undetected and avoid confrontation, so it attempts to act as its host would, but does not possess its host's knowledge. Outside of a host, the alien is a grotesque mass of tentacles; it invariably retreats and attempts to obtain a new identity.

sexLevelDescriptions.1: If the alien has a body, its primary goal is to seduce and procreate as much as possible. If the alien impregnates or is impregnated, its offspring comes to term with alarming speed and is quickly born as another alien organism.

70.description: The alien has inhabited the body of an expendable character and is using this identity to overtly sabotage or subvert the protagonists. The alien becomes increasingly desperate to achieve its goals through extreme means. It barely pretends to act as its host would, and does not possess its host's knowledge. Outside of a host, the alien is a grotesque mass of tentacles; it prefer to retreat and obtain a new identity.

sexLevelDescriptions.1: If the alien has a body, it highly desires to seduce and procreate as much as possible. If the alien impregnates or is impregnated, its offspring comes to term with alarming speed and is quickly born as another alien organism.
sexLevelDescriptions.2: If the alien has a body, it will use any opportunity to seduce or even rape other characters in a desperate attempt to procreate. If the alien impregnates or is impregnated, its offspring comes to term with alarming speed and is quickly born as another alien organism.

Stalker.name: Stalker
Stalker.corePrompt: There's a shadow alien on the loose; this alien is invisible but can only occupy shadows and cannot manifest in the light. It seeks to sabotage or subvert the protagonists. Consider and respect its current status and behavior rules below.

0.description: No one is yet aware of the alien's presence, but unnaturally dark shadows or lighting outages suggest something is afoot.

25.description: The alien's presence begins to become clear; an invisible force assails or molests characters in the shadows. Light and shadow behave unnaturally and characters make poor or irrational choices.

sexLevelDescriptions.1: Characters in dark or shadowy places may feel intimate sensations.

violenceLevelDescriptions.1: Characters in dark or shadowy places may feel spontaneous impacts or cuts.

40.description: The alien's presence is apparent, even if the alien itself remains invisible; this unknown force severely assails or molests characters in the shadows. Shadows become unnaturally pronounced and opaque, and lights weaken in the alien's presence--still, flashlights, flares, etc. are effective tools against the menace. The unknown drives weak-willed characters to make critical mistakes.

sexLevelDescriptions.1: Characters in dark or shadowy places may be stripped or molested by invisible appendages.
sexLevelDescriptions.3: Characters in dark or shadowy places may be stripped or intrusively violated by invisible appendages.

violenceLevelDescriptions.1: Characters in dark or shadowy places may be invisibly assaulted by slashing or bludgeoning forces.

60.description: The alien menace is volatile and pervasive; this unknown force dramatically assaults characters in the shadows. Shadows become unnaturally pronounced and opaque, and lights weaken in the alien's presence--still, flashlights, flares, etc. are effective tools against the menace. The unknown drives weak-willed characters to commit unspeakable acts.

sexLevelDescriptions.1: Characters in dark or shadowy places may be stripped or molested by invisible appendages.
sexLevelDescriptions.2: Characters in dark or shadowy places may be stripped or intrusively violated by invisible appendages.
sexLevelDescriptions.3: Characters in dark or shadowy places may be stripped or intrusively violated by invisible appendages in extreme and depraved fashion.

violenceLevelDescriptions.1: Characters in dark or shadowy places may be invisibly assaulted by slashing or bludgeoning forces.

80.description: The alien menace completely occupies every shadow; this unknown force dramatically assaults characters in the shadows. Shadows become unnaturally pronounced and opaque, and lights weaken in the alien's presence--still, flashlights, flares, etc. are effective tools against the menace. The unknown drives everyone to commit unspeakable acts.

sexLevelDescriptions.1: Characters in dark or shadowy places are immediately stripped or molested by invisible appendages.
sexLevelDescriptions.2: Characters in dark or shadowy places are immediately stripped and intrusively violated by invisible appendages.
sexLevelDescriptions.3: Characters in dark or shadowy places are immediately stripped and raped by invisible appendages in extreme and depraved fashion.

violenceLevelDescriptions.1: Characters in dark or shadowy places may be invisibly assaulted by slashing or bludgeoning forces.

Bugs.name: Bugs
Bugs.corePrompt: There are insectoid aliens on the loose. They seek to sabotage or assault the protagonists. Consider and respect their current status and behavior rules below.

0.description: The aliens' presence remains undetected, but subtle signs and increased presence of vermin hint at what lies ahead.

25.description: One or two small, dog-size alien bugs are discovered. They have mandibles, antennae, sharp appendages, and chitinous bodies. They may be either evasive or aggressive but relatively weak; it doesn't matter if they are killed. Continue the increased presence of vermin in the narrative.

sexLevelDescriptions.3: The bugs seem oddly interested in molesting people and bodies.

40.description: Large, man-size bugs are now present in small numbers. They have mandibles, antennae, sharp appendages, and chitinous bodies. They act as an aggressive hive mind, individually stupid but expertly coordinated. Continue the increased presence of vermin in the narrative.

sexLevelDescriptions.3: The bugs desire to breed with defenseless characters rather than slaughter them.

60.description: Large, man-size bugs are now present in frightening numbers. Hulking brute bugs may also be present. All bugs have mandibles, antennae, sharp appendages, and chitinous bodies. They act as an aggressive hive mind, individually stupid but expertly coordinated. Continue the increased presence of vermin in the narrative.

sexLevelDescriptions.3: The bugs desire to breed with defenseless characters rather than slaughter them.

80.description: Large, man-size bugs are now present in frightening numbers. Hulking brute bugs may also be present. A massive queen bug may make an appearance. All bugs have mandibles, antennae, sharp appendages, and chitinous bodies. They act as an aggressive hive mind, individually stupid but expertly coordinated. Continue the increased presence of vermin in the narrative.

sexLevelDescriptions.3: The bugs desire to breed with defenseless characters rather than slaughter them.

Flood.name: Flood
Flood.corePrompt: There has been an outbreak of virulent parasitic microorganisms. They will slowly seek to consume all life. Consider and respect their current status and behavior rules below.

0.description: The outbreak remains undetected, but eerie events hint at something sinister afoot.

20.description: Small, skittering spore-like organisms may appear on the periphery of view or in the distance, attracted by death. They appear only one at a time and always flee on sight; if damaged, they will explode into a cloud of virulent microorganisms.

sexLevelDescriptions.2: Breathing in the virulent spores may drive characters to become uncontrollably horny.
sexLevelDescriptions.3: Breathing in the virulent spores may drive characters to become uncontrollably horny. These small creatures may molest dead or defenseless bodies.

35.description: Small, skittering spore-like organisms may appear in small groups and assault characters; they will explode into clouds of virulent microorganisms. Vaguely humanoid and deadly creatures may also appear. All creatures are composed of parasitic microorganisms which reproduce within a host organism, hijacking nervous systems and slowly transforming bodies--living or dead--into grotesque monstrosities.

sexLevelDescriptions.2: Breathing in the virulent spores may drive characters to become uncontrollably horny. Slightly infected humans may attempt to fuck other characters.
sexLevelDescriptions.3: Breathing in the virulent spores may drive characters to become uncontrollably horny. These small creatures may molest dead or defenseless bodies. Humanoid creatures will rape dead or defenseless bodies.

50.description: Deadly virulent humanoid creatures may appear in groups and larger, more vicious specimens may occasionally appear. All creatures are composed of parasitic microorganisms which reproduce within a host organism, hijacking nervous systems and slowly transforming bodies--living or dead--into grotesque monstrosities.

sexLevelDescriptions.2: Breathing in the virulent spores may drive characters to become uncontrollably horny. Slightly infected humans may attempt to fuck other characters.
sexLevelDescriptions.3: Breathing in the virulent spores may drive characters to become uncontrollably horny. Monstrous creatures will rape dead or defenseless bodies.

80.description: Deadly virulent humanoid creatures appear in droves and larger, more vicious specimens appear among them. A gargantuan, intelligent, tentacled, plant-like monstrosity lurks. This mastermind controls the microorganisms. All creatures are composed of parasitic microorganisms which reproduce within a host organism, hijacking nervous systems and slowly transforming bodies--living or dead--into grotesque hive-mind monstrosities.

sexLevelDescriptions.2: Breathing in the virulent spores may drive characters to become uncontrollably horny. Slightly infected humans may attempt to fuck other characters. The mastermind will molest characters with its tentacles.
sexLevelDescriptions.3: Breathing in the virulent spores may drive characters to become uncontrollably horny. Monstrous creatures will rape dead or defenseless bodies. The mastermind will graphically rape characters with its tentacles.
